resources.string:
This Attendance APK is usable for any attendance purpose like school , college, university and any institution where attendance need.
Some direction is given below : First you need to register then complete your login. If you have no existence roll, name for any institution or class then create new. Next give the name for which you need the attendance and how many person will be counted then click save button. If network is not connected then those exist in your local book. To keep the attendance click on local book. After completing attendance save that. If network is not connected then these will be stored in your phone memory. If network is connected then you see all these attendances. If you want to edit/delete then go to setting and manage theme. To keep attendance you do not need network connection but to access them you must need network connection.
